9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Sahl bin Sa'd narrated that :the Messenger of Allah said: "There is no Muslim who says the Talbiyah except that - on his right and left, until the end f the land, from here to there - the rocks, or trees, or mud say the Talbiyah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ التَّلْبِيَةِ وَالنَّحْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of The Talbiyah And the Nahr (Sacrifice)
